title: Always Open Source
desc:
All parts of openHAB X will always be
open source!

features.title: Addons
features.details:
All addons are owned and published by their respective authors and are usually made available under a permissive, open source license.

This includes the SnipsAI local voice recognition integration, MQTT integration and Hue integration.

features.title: Core Services
features.details:
* OpenHAB Core Shim to make [openHAB 2 Addons](https://www.openhab.org/addons) work
* Automation Engine
* Identity / Access Management
* Addon Manager and Supervisior
* Backup & Restore with Snapshots and Rollbacks

features.title: Cloud Connector
features.details:
* Amazon Alexa
* Google Home
* If-This-Than-That (IFTTT)

Please differentiate between the open source cloud connector software and open source Alexa Skill and Google Home Action and the service that is hosted via openhabx.com.

features.title: User Interfaces
features.details:
* Dashpanel UI for wall mounted tablets
* Flutter Android/iOS App
* Management Web UI

title: Cloud connector
desc: A steady connection is required for easy cloud service integration. See [details](/dashboard/costs).

title: Support plan
desc: This plan funds openHAB X development. It also includes dedicated support time.
